products.name: Premium Vitamin D3 5000 IU
products.description: High-potency Vitamin D3 supplement supporting bone health, immune function, and overall wellness. Each softgel contains 5000 IU of cholecalciferol in a premium olive oil base for optimal absorption.
products.detailed_description: Our Premium Vitamin D3 supplement is formulated with the highest quality cholecalciferol (D3) - the same form your body naturally produces when exposed to sunlight. This essential vitamin plays a crucial role in calcium absorption, bone mineralization, immune system regulation, and muscle function. Each easy-to-swallow softgel is suspended in organic olive oil to enhance bioavailability and ensure maximum absorption.
products.directions: Take 1 softgel daily with a meal, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications. Do not exceed recommended dose.
benefits: Supports bone health and calcium absorption
Aids in muscle strength and function

products.name: Complete Multivitamin for Women
products.description: Comprehensive daily multivitamin specifically formulated for women's nutritional needs, including iron, folate, and biotin for energy, reproductive health, and beauty support.
products.detailed_description: This advanced multivitamin formula addresses the unique nutritional needs of women with carefully selected vitamins, minerals, and botanicals. Features chelated minerals for superior absorption, active B-vitamins for energy metabolism, and antioxidants for cellular protection. Includes women-specific nutrients like iron for menstrual support, folate for reproductive health, and biotin for hair, skin, and nail health.
products.directions: Take 2 tablets daily with food, preferably with breakfast.
products.warnings: Contains iron, which can be harmful in large amounts. Keep out of reach of children. Consult healthcare provider if pregnant or nursing.
benefits: Promotes healthy hair, skin, and nails
Aids in red blood cell formation

products.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil 1000mg
products.description: Premium fish oil supplement providing 1000mg of omega-3 fatty acids per softgel, including EPA and DHA for heart, brain, and joint health support.
products.detailed_description: Sourced from wild-caught, cold-water fish and molecularly distilled for purity, our Omega-3 Fish Oil delivers essential fatty acids your body cannot produce on its own. Each softgel provides a concentrated dose of EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid) to support cardiovascular health, cognitive function, and inflammatory response. Third-party tested for mercury, PCBs, and other contaminants.
products.directions: Take 1-2 softgels daily with meals, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if taking blood-thinning medications. May cause fishy aftertaste in some individuals.
benefits: Aids in joint health and mobility

products.name: Probiotics 50 Billion CFU
products.description: Advanced probiotic formula with 50 billion CFU and 12 diverse strains to support digestive health, immune function, and overall gut microbiome balance.
products.detailed_description: This potent probiotic supplement features a carefully selected blend of 12 clinically studied bacterial strains, including Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium species. Each delayed-release capsule is designed to survive stomach acid and deliver live probiotics directly to the intestines where they're needed most. Supports digestive comfort, nutrient absorption, and immune system function through gut health optimization.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily on an empty stomach, preferably in the morning, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Refrigerate after opening for maximum potency. Consult healthcare provider if immunocompromised or taking antibiotics.
benefits: May help reduce occasional digestive discomfort

products.name: Magnesium Glycinate 400mg
products.description: Highly bioavailable magnesium glycinate supplement supporting muscle relaxation, sleep quality, and nervous system function. Gentle on the stomach and easily absorbed.
products.detailed_description: Our Magnesium Glycinate is chelated with the amino acid glycine for superior absorption and minimal digestive upset. This essential mineral plays a role in over 300 enzymatic reactions in the body, supporting muscle and nerve function, energy production, and bone health. The glycinate form is particularly beneficial for promoting relaxation and supporting healthy sleep patterns.
products.directions: Take 2 capsules daily, preferably with meals or before bedtime, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if you have kidney problems or are taking medications. May cause loose stools in sensitive individuals.

products.name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
products.description: Intensive hydrating serum with multiple molecular weights of hyaluronic acid to plump, smooth, and deeply moisturize skin for a youthful, radiant complexion.
products.detailed_description: This advanced hyaluronic acid serum features a unique blend of high, medium, and low molecular weight hyaluronic acid molecules to provide multi-level hydration. The smaller molecules penetrate deeper into the skin while larger molecules form a protective moisture barrier on the surface. Enhanced with vitamin B5 and botanical extracts for additional skin conditioning benefits.
products.directions: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp skin morning and evening. Follow with moisturizer. For external use only.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Patch test recommended.

products.name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
products.description: Potent 20% Vitamin C serum with L-Ascorbic Acid to brighten skin, reduce dark spots, and provide antioxidant protection against environmental damage.
products.detailed_description: This high-potency vitamin C serum combines 20% L-Ascorbic Acid with vitamin E and ferulic acid for enhanced stability and efficacy. The formula helps stimulate collagen production, fade hyperpigmentation, and protect against free radical damage. Packaged in a dark glass bottle with dropper for optimal preservation of active ingredients.
products.directions: Apply 3-4 drops to clean skin in the morning. Always follow with SPF during the day. Start with every other day and gradually increase frequency.
products.warnings: May cause initial tingling. Use sunscreen during the day. Avoid eye area. Refrigerate for extended shelf life.

products.name: Retinol Night Cream 0.5%
products.description: Advanced anti-aging night cream with 0.5% retinol to reduce fine lines, improve skin texture, and promote cellular renewal while you sleep.
products.detailed_description: This luxurious night cream features encapsulated retinol technology for gradual release and reduced irritation. Combined with nourishing ingredients like squalane, peptides, and ceramides to support the skin barrier while retinol works to accelerate cell turnover and stimulate collagen production. The rich, creamy texture provides overnight hydration and repair.
products.directions: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean skin at night. Start 2-3 times per week and gradually increase. Always use SPF during the day.
products.warnings: For nighttime use only. May increase sun sensitivity. Avoid eye area. Discontinue if excessive irritation occurs. Not recommended during pregnancy.

products.name: Ibuprofen 200mg Tablets
products.description: Fast-acting ibuprofen tablets for temporary relief of minor aches, pains, headaches, and fever reduction. Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID).
products.detailed_description: These ibuprofen tablets provide effective temporary relief from minor aches and pains associated with headaches, muscular aches, minor pain of arthritis, toothache, backache, menstrual cramps, and the common cold. Also temporarily reduces fever. Each tablet contains 200mg of ibuprofen in an easy-to-swallow coated tablet form.
products.directions: Adults and children 12 years and over: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours while symptoms persist. Do not exceed 6 tablets in 24 hours unless directed by a doctor.
products.warnings: Do not exceed recommended dose. Do not use if you have ever had an allergic reaction to ibuprofen. Ask a doctor before use if you have stomach problems, high blood pressure, heart disease, or kidney disease.

products.name: Allergy Relief Loratadine 10mg
products.description: 24-hour non-drowsy antihistamine tablets for relief of seasonal allergies, hay fever, and indoor/outdoor allergens. Contains loratadine 10mg.
products.detailed_description: These non-drowsy antihistamine tablets provide 24-hour relief from seasonal allergy symptoms including sneezing, runny nose, itchy watery eyes, and itchy throat or nose. The active ingredient loratadine is a second-generation antihistamine that doesn't typically cause drowsiness, making it suitable for daytime use.
products.directions: Adults and children 6 years and over: Take 1 tablet daily. Do not take more than 1 tablet in 24 hours. Children under 6 years: Ask a doctor.
products.warnings: Do not exceed recommended dose. Ask a doctor before use if you have liver or kidney disease. Stop use and ask a doctor if an allergic reaction occurs.

products.name: Antacid Calcium Carbonate Chewable
products.description: Fast-acting chewable antacid tablets with calcium carbonate for quick relief of heartburn, acid indigestion, and upset stomach. Pleasant mint flavor.
products.detailed_description: These chewable antacid tablets provide fast, effective relief from heartburn, acid indigestion, and sour stomach. Each tablet contains 750mg of calcium carbonate, which neutralizes excess stomach acid on contact. The pleasant mint flavor makes them easy to take, and they also provide a supplemental source of calcium.
products.directions: Chew 2-4 tablets as symptoms occur, or as directed by a doctor. Do not take more than 16 tablets in 24 hours.
products.warnings: Ask a doctor before use if you have kidney stones or are on a calcium-restricted diet. Do not use maximum dosage for more than 2 weeks.

products.name: Turmeric Curcumin 1500mg
products.description: High-potency turmeric curcumin supplement with black pepper extract for enhanced absorption. Supports joint health and healthy inflammatory response.
products.detailed_description: This premium turmeric supplement features 1500mg of turmeric root extract standardized to 95% curcuminoids per serving. Enhanced with BioPerine black pepper extract to increase bioavailability by up to 2000%. Curcumin is the active compound in turmeric known for its antioxidant properties and support of healthy inflammatory response.
products.directions: Take 2 capsules daily with meals, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking blood-thinning medications. May increase bleeding risk.

products.name: Ashwagandha Root Extract 600mg
products.description: Premium ashwagandha root extract standardized to 5% withanolides. Adaptogenic herb traditionally used to support stress management and energy levels.
products.detailed_description: This high-quality ashwagandha supplement features KSM-66, a full-spectrum root extract that has been clinically studied for its adaptogenic properties. Ashwagandha is an ancient Ayurvedic herb traditionally used to help the body manage stress, support energy levels, and promote overall vitality. Each capsule provides 600mg of standardized extract.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with food, preferably in the evening, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications. Not recommended for use with immunosuppressive drugs.

products.name: Elderberry Immune Support Gummies
products.description: Delicious elderberry gummies with vitamin C and zinc for immune system support. Natural berry flavor, pectin-based, and suitable for adults and children.
products.detailed_description: These tasty elderberry gummies combine the immune-supporting benefits of elderberry extract with vitamin C and zinc in a convenient, great-tasting format. Made with real elderberry extract and natural flavors, these pectin-based gummies are a pleasant way to support your family's immune health year-round.
products.directions: Adults and children 4 years and older: Take 2 gummies daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Do not exceed recommended dose. Consult healthcare provider before giving to children under 4.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Gel 70% Alcohol
products.description: Fast-acting hand sanitizer gel with 70% ethyl alcohol. Kills 99.99% of germs while moisturizing with aloe vera and vitamin E.
products.detailed_description: This effective hand sanitizer gel contains 70% ethyl alcohol to kill 99.99% of common germs and bacteria when soap and water are not available. Enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E to help prevent dryness and keep hands feeling soft. The gel formula spreads easily and dries quickly without leaving a sticky residue.
products.directions: Apply to palm of hand and rub hands together until dry. For external use only. Supervise children under 6 years of age when using this product.
products.warnings: For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from heat and flame. Do not use in eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

products.name: Thermometer Digital Oral
products.description: Fast and accurate digital thermometer for oral, rectal, or underarm temperature measurement. Features fever alarm and memory recall.
products.detailed_description: This reliable digital thermometer provides accurate temperature readings in just 60 seconds. Features a large, easy-to-read LCD display, fever alarm that beeps when temperature exceeds 99.5°F (37.5°C), and memory function that recalls the last reading. The flexible tip ensures comfort during use, and the thermometer automatically shuts off after 10 minutes to preserve battery life.
products.directions: Turn on, place under tongue, wait for beep. Clean with alcohol before and after each use. Replace battery when low battery symbol appears.
products.warnings: For household use only. Clean before and after each use. Do not bite the thermometer. Keep away from small children when not in use.

products.name: First Aid Kit Complete 100-Piece
products.description: Comprehensive 100-piece first aid kit for home, office, or travel. Includes bandages, antiseptic wipes, pain relievers, and emergency supplies in organized case.
products.detailed_description: This complete first aid kit contains 100 essential items for treating minor injuries and emergencies. Organized in a durable, portable case with clear compartments for easy access. Perfect for home, office, car, or outdoor activities. Includes a comprehensive first aid guide with step-by-step instructions for common injuries.
products.directions: Refer to included first aid manual for proper use of each item. Check expiration dates regularly and replace expired items.
products.warnings: For external use only on most items. Read individual product labels. Seek professional medical attention for serious injuries.

products.name: Biotin 10,000 mcg Hair Growth
products.description: High-potency biotin supplement supporting healthy hair, skin, and nail growth. 10,000 mcg per capsule for maximum beauty benefits.
products.detailed_description: This high-potency biotin supplement provides 10,000 mcg of biotin (Vitamin B7) per capsule to support the health and appearance of hair, skin, and nails. Biotin plays a crucial role in keratin production, the protein that makes up hair and nails. This supplement is ideal for those looking to support hair growth, strengthen brittle nails, and promote healthy skin.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with a meal, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications. May affect certain lab test results.

products.name: Zinc 50mg Immune Support
products.description: Essential zinc supplement supporting immune function, wound healing, and protein synthesis. Chelated form for optimal absorption.
products.detailed_description: This zinc supplement provides 50mg of elemental zinc in a chelated form for superior absorption and minimal stomach upset. Zinc is an essential mineral that plays a vital role in immune function, wound healing, protein synthesis, and DNA synthesis. It also supports normal growth and development during pregnancy, childhood, and adolescence.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with food to minimize stomach upset, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Do not exceed recommended dose. Taking too much zinc can interfere with copper absorption. Consult healthcare provider if taking other supplements.

products.name: Sunscreen SPF 50 Broad Spectrum
products.description: Water-resistant broad spectrum sunscreen with SPF 50 protection. Lightweight, non-greasy formula suitable for face and body use.
products.detailed_description: This advanced broad spectrum sunscreen provides superior protection against both UVA and UVB rays with SPF 50. The lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly without leaving a white residue. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, making it perfect for outdoor activities. Contains antioxidants to help protect against environmental damage.
products.directions: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every 2 hours or after swimming, sweating, or toweling off.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.

products.name: Cough Drops Honey Lemon
products.description: Soothing honey lemon cough drops with menthol for temporary relief of cough and throat irritation. Natural honey and real lemon flavor.
products.detailed_description: These soothing cough drops combine the natural benefits of honey with refreshing lemon flavor and cooling menthol to provide temporary relief from cough and minor throat irritation. Made with real honey and natural lemon flavor, these drops help soothe throat discomfort while providing a pleasant taste experience.
products.directions: Adults and children 5 years and over: Allow 1 drop to dissolve slowly in mouth. May be repeated every 2 hours as needed.
products.warnings: Do not exceed 6 drops in 24 hours. Not recommended for children under 5 years. Consult a doctor if cough persists for more than 7 days.

products.name: Echinacea Purple Coneflower 400mg
products.description: Traditional echinacea supplement from purple coneflower root and aerial parts. Standardized extract supporting seasonal immune wellness.
products.detailed_description: This premium echinacea supplement combines both root and aerial parts of Echinacea purpurea (purple coneflower) in a standardized extract. Traditionally used by Native Americans for centuries, echinacea is one of the most popular herbs for supporting seasonal immune wellness. Each capsule provides 400mg of high-quality echinacea extract.
ingredients: Echinacea purpurea Extract (root and aerial parts) 400mg
products.directions: Take 1 capsule 1-3 times daily with meals, or as directed by your healthcare professional. Best used at first signs of seasonal challenges.
products.warnings: Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or have autoimmune conditions. Discontinue use if allergic reaction occurs.

products.name: Blood Pressure Monitor Digital
products.description: Automatic digital blood pressure monitor with large display, memory storage, and irregular heartbeat detection. Clinically validated accuracy.
products.detailed_description: This professional-grade digital blood pressure monitor provides accurate, reliable readings in the comfort of your home. Features a large, easy-to-read LCD display, memory storage for 60 readings, and irregular heartbeat detection. The adjustable cuff fits arms 9-17 inches in circumference. Clinically validated for accuracy and recommended by healthcare professionals.
products.directions: Sit quietly for 5 minutes before measurement. Place cuff on upper arm, press start button, remain still during measurement. Record results as recommended by healthcare provider.
products.warnings: Not suitable for children under 12. Consult healthcare provider for interpretation of readings. Do not use if you have severe arrhythmia.

products.name: Vitamin B12 Methylcobalamin 1000mcg
products.description: High-potency methylcobalamin B12 supplement for energy, nerve function, and red blood cell formation. Fast-dissolving sublingual tablets.
products.detailed_description: Our premium B12 supplement uses methylcobalamin, the most bioactive form of vitamin B12. Essential for energy metabolism, nervous system function, and DNA synthesis. Sublingual tablets dissolve quickly under the tongue for optimal absorption.
products.directions: Place 1 tablet under tongue and allow to dissolve completely. Take daily or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications.

products.name: Iron Bisglycinate 25mg
products.description: Gentle iron supplement with superior absorption and minimal stomach upset. Chelated bisglycinate form for optimal bioavailability.
products.detailed_description: This advanced iron supplement uses bisglycinate chelation technology for superior absorption and reduced gastrointestinal side effects. Essential for oxygen transport, energy production, and immune function.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with food or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Iron can be harmful in large amounts. Consult physician if pregnant or nursing.

products.name: Calcium Citrate with Vitamin D3
products.description: Highly absorbable calcium citrate combined with vitamin D3 for optimal bone health and calcium absorption.
products.detailed_description: This premium bone health formula combines calcium citrate, the most absorbable form of calcium, with vitamin D3 to enhance calcium absorption and utilization. Essential for bone density, muscle function, and cardiovascular health.
products.directions: Take 2 capsules daily with meals, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if taking medications or have kidney stones history.

products.name: Retinol Anti-Aging Serum 2.5%
products.description: Professional-strength retinol serum for reducing fine lines, wrinkles, and improving skin texture. Contains 2.5% retinol with soothing botanicals.
products.detailed_description: This potent anti-aging serum features 2.5% pure retinol combined with hyaluronic acid and botanical extracts to minimize irritation while maximizing results. Clinically proven to reduce fine lines, improve skin texture, and promote cellular turnover.
products.directions: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, dry skin in the evening. Start with 2-3 times per week, gradually increase frequency. Always use sunscreen during the day.
products.warnings: For external use only. May increase sun sensitivity. Avoid eye area. Discontinue if irritation occurs.

products.name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc Serum
products.description: High-concentration niacinamide serum with zinc for reducing blemishes, minimizing pores, and controlling oil production.
products.detailed_description: This powerful serum combines 10% niacinamide (Vitamin B3) with 1% zinc to target multiple skin concerns. Helps reduce the appearance of blemishes, minimize enlarged pores, regulate sebum production, and improve overall skin texture.
products.directions: Apply 2-3 drops to entire face morning and evening after cleansing. Can be used with other serums and moisturizers.
products.warnings: For external use only. Patch test recommended. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

products.name: Melatonin 5mg Sleep Support
products.description: Natural sleep aid with 5mg melatonin to help regulate sleep-wake cycles and promote restful sleep.
products.detailed_description: This natural sleep supplement contains 5mg of pharmaceutical-grade melatonin to help reset your circadian rhythm and promote healthy sleep patterns. Fast-dissolving tablets for quick absorption and faster onset of sleepiness.
products.directions: Take 1 tablet 30 minutes before bedtime. Do not exceed recommended dose.
products.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery after taking. Consult physician if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications.

products.name: Probiotic 50 Billion CFU
products.description: High-potency probiotic with 50 billion CFU and 10 strains for digestive health and immune support.
products.detailed_description: This advanced probiotic formula contains 50 billion colony-forming units (CFU) from 10 clinically studied strains. Supports digestive health, immune function, and overall gut microbiome balance. Delayed-release capsules ensure survival through stomach acid.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with or without food, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if immunocompromised or taking antibiotics.

products.name: Ashwagandha Root Extract 600mg
products.description: Premium ashwagandha root extract standardized to 5% withanolides for stress management and adaptogenic support.
products.detailed_description: This high-quality ashwagandha supplement features KSM-66, the most clinically studied form of ashwagandha. Standardized to 5% withanolides, this adaptogenic herb helps the body manage stress, supports energy levels, and promotes overall well-being.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule twice daily with meals, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications. Not recommended for autoimmune conditions.

products.name: Milk Thistle Silymarin 175mg
products.description: Standardized milk thistle extract with 80% silymarin for liver health and detoxification support.
products.detailed_description: This premium milk thistle supplement provides 175mg of standardized extract containing 80% silymarin, the active compound responsible for liver-protective benefits. Supports liver function, detoxification processes, and overall hepatic health.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule 2-3 times daily with meals, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or have liver disease.

products.name: Pulse Oximeter Fingertip
products.description: Accurate fingertip pulse oximeter for measuring blood oxygen saturation and pulse rate with LED display.
products.detailed_description: This professional-grade pulse oximeter provides accurate measurements of blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) and pulse rate. Features a bright LED display, automatic shut-off, and comes with a lanyard and carrying case. Ideal for athletes, pilots, and health monitoring.
products.directions: Insert finger into chamber, press power button, wait for stable reading. Remove finger when measurement is complete.
products.warnings: Not for continuous monitoring. Consult healthcare provider for medical interpretation. Not suitable for infants.

products.name: Digital Thermometer Infrared
products.description: Non-contact infrared thermometer for accurate temperature readings. Suitable for forehead and surface temperature measurement.
products.detailed_description: This advanced infrared thermometer provides accurate, non-contact temperature measurements in just 1 second. Features fever alarm, memory storage for 32 readings, and can measure both body and surface temperatures. LCD display with backlight for easy reading.
products.directions: Point at forehead 1-3cm away, press trigger, read result on display. Clean sensor regularly with alcohol wipe.
products.warnings: For external use only. Clean sensor before each use. Not waterproof.

products.name: Emergency First Aid Kit 100-Piece
products.description: Comprehensive 100-piece first aid kit for home, office, or travel. Includes bandages, antiseptics, and emergency supplies.
products.detailed_description: This complete first aid kit contains 100 essential medical supplies organized in a durable, portable case. Includes various bandages, antiseptic wipes, gauze pads, medical tape, scissors, tweezers, and emergency blanket. Perfect for home, office, car, or outdoor activities.
products.directions: Use appropriate supplies based on injury type. Follow first aid manual instructions. Replace used items promptly.
products.warnings: For external use only. Check expiration dates regularly. Seek professional medical help for serious injuries.

products.name: Instant Cold Compress Pack of 6
products.description: Instant cold compress packs for immediate relief of sprains, bruises, and minor injuries. No refrigeration required.
products.detailed_description: These instant cold compresses activate immediately when squeezed, providing therapeutic cold therapy for up to 20 minutes. No refrigeration needed - perfect for first aid kits, sports bags, and emergency situations. Flexible design conforms to body contours.
products.directions: Squeeze firmly to activate. Apply to injured area for 15-20 minutes. Do not apply directly to skin - use cloth barrier.
products.warnings: Single use only. Do not puncture or ingest contents. Dispose of properly after use.

products.name: CoQ10 Ubiquinol 100mg
products.description: Premium ubiquinol form of CoQ10 for superior absorption and cardiovascular health support.
products.detailed_description: This advanced CoQ10 supplement features ubiquinol, the active antioxidant form of coenzyme Q10. Essential for cellular energy production and cardiovascular health. Ubiquinol offers superior bioavailability compared to standard ubiquinone forms.
products.directions: Take 1 softgel daily with a meal containing fat, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if taking blood-thinning medications or have medical conditions.

products.name: Zinc Picolinate 30mg
products.description: Highly absorbable zinc picolinate for immune support, wound healing, and antioxidant protection.
products.detailed_description: This premium zinc supplement uses the picolinate form for superior absorption and bioavailability. Essential for immune function, protein synthesis, wound healing, and antioxidant enzyme activity. Gentle on the stomach when taken with food.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily with food, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Do not exceed recommended dose. High doses may interfere with copper absorption. Consult physician if pregnant or nursing.

products.name: Vitamin C Serum 20% + Vitamin E
products.description: High-potency vitamin C serum with 20% L-ascorbic acid and vitamin E for brightening and anti-aging benefits.
products.detailed_description: This powerful antioxidant serum combines 20% L-ascorbic acid with vitamin E and ferulic acid for maximum stability and efficacy. Helps brighten skin, reduce dark spots, stimulate collagen production, and protect against environmental damage.
products.directions: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin in the morning. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen. Start with every other day if sensitive.
products.warnings: For external use only. May increase sun sensitivity. Patch test recommended. Store in cool, dark place.

products.name: Salicylic Acid 2% BHA Exfoliant
products.description: Gentle yet effective 2% salicylic acid treatment for unclogging pores, reducing blackheads, and improving skin texture.
products.detailed_description: This beta hydroxy acid (BHA) treatment penetrates deep into pores to remove dead skin cells, excess oil, and debris. Helps reduce blackheads, minimize pore appearance, and improve overall skin texture while being gentle enough for daily use.
products.directions: Apply thin layer to clean skin 2-3 times per week initially, gradually increase to daily use. Follow with moisturizer.
products.warnings: For external use only. May increase sun sensitivity. Avoid eye area. Discontinue if excessive dryness occurs.

products.name: Electrolyte Powder Packets
products.description: Sugar-free electrolyte powder packets for hydration support during exercise, illness, or hot weather.
products.detailed_description: These convenient single-serve packets provide essential electrolytes including sodium, potassium, magnesium, and calcium to support proper hydration. Sugar-free formula with natural flavors, perfect for athletes, travelers, or anyone needing hydration support.
products.directions: Mix 1 packet with 16-20 oz of water. Stir well and drink. Use during or after exercise, or as needed for hydration.
products.warnings: Consult physician if on sodium-restricted diet or taking medications. Do not exceed 3 packets per day.

products.name: Digestive Enzymes Complex
products.description: Comprehensive digestive enzyme blend to support protein, carbohydrate, and fat digestion.
products.detailed_description: This advanced enzyme complex contains a full spectrum of digestive enzymes including protease, amylase, lipase, cellulase, and lactase. Helps break down proteins, carbohydrates, fats, and fiber for improved digestion and nutrient absorption.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule with each meal, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or have digestive disorders.

products.name: Rhodiola Rosea Extract 500mg
products.description: Premium rhodiola rosea extract standardized to 3% rosavins and 1% salidroside for stress adaptation and mental clarity.
products.detailed_description: This high-quality rhodiola supplement features standardized extract from the root of Rhodiola rosea, a powerful adaptogenic herb. Traditionally used to help the body adapt to physical and mental stress while supporting energy, mood, and cognitive function.
products.directions: Take 1 capsule daily on an empty stomach, preferably in the morning, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or taking medications. May cause mild stimulation.

products.name: Ginkgo Biloba Extract 120mg
products.description: Standardized ginkgo biloba leaf extract for cognitive support, memory enhancement, and circulation.
products.detailed_description: This premium ginkgo biloba supplement provides 120mg of standardized extract (24% flavone glycosides, 6% terpene lactones) from the leaves of the ancient ginkgo tree. Traditionally used to support cognitive function, memory, and healthy circulation.
ingredients: Standardized to 24% Flavone Glycosides and 6% Terpene Lactones
products.directions: Take 1 capsule twice daily with meals, or as directed by healthcare professional.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if taking blood-thinning medications or have bleeding disorders.

products.name: Compression Socks Graduated 20-30mmHg
products.description: Medical-grade graduated compression socks for improved circulation, reduced swelling, and leg comfort.
products.detailed_description: These professional-grade compression socks provide 20-30mmHg graduated compression to improve blood flow, reduce swelling, and prevent blood pooling in the legs. Made with moisture-wicking fabric and reinforced heel and toe for durability.
products.directions: Put on in the morning before swelling occurs. Wear throughout the day. Remove before sleeping unless directed by physician.
products.warnings: Consult physician before use if you have diabetes, peripheral artery disease, or skin conditions.
products.dimensions: Available in S, M, L, XL sizes

products.name: Essential Oil Diffuser Ultrasonic
products.description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with LED lights, timer settings, and auto shut-off for aromatherapy and relaxation.
products.detailed_description: This elegant ultrasonic diffuser uses advanced technology to disperse essential oils into fine mist without heat, preserving the therapeutic properties. Features 7 LED color options, multiple timer settings, and whisper-quiet operation perfect for bedrooms, offices, or living spaces.
products.directions: Fill with water to max line, add 3-5 drops essential oil, select mist and light settings, press power button.
products.warnings: Use only with pure essential oils. Clean regularly. Do not operate without water.

products.name: Elastic Bandage Wrap 4-inch
products.description: High-quality elastic bandage wrap for sprains, strains, and compression support. Reusable with metal clips.
products.detailed_description: This professional-grade elastic bandage provides consistent compression and support for injured joints and muscles. Made from high-quality cotton and elastic fibers, it maintains elasticity wash after wash. Includes metal clips for secure fastening.
products.directions: Wrap snugly but not too tight around injured area. Secure with clips. Check circulation regularly.
products.warnings: Do not wrap too tightly. Check for proper circulation. Remove if numbness or tingling occurs.

products.name: Hydrocolloid Bandages Assorted
products.description: Advanced hydrocolloid bandages for faster wound healing. Waterproof, breathable, and promotes moist healing environment.
products.detailed_description: These advanced hydrocolloid bandages create an optimal moist healing environment that promotes faster wound healing and reduces scarring. Waterproof and breathable design protects wounds while allowing natural healing processes. Assorted sizes for various wound types.
products.directions: Clean wound, apply bandage with adhesive border extending beyond wound edges. Change when gel becomes opaque or edges lift.
products.warnings: For external use only. Do not use on infected wounds. Change if signs of infection develop.

products.name: Whey Protein Isolate - Vanilla
products.description: Premium whey protein isolate providing 25g of pure protein per serving, ideal for muscle growth, recovery, and lean mass development. Delicious natural vanilla flavor.
products.detailed_description: Our Whey Protein Isolate is ultra-filtered for maximum purity, delivering a fast-absorbing protein source with minimal fats and carbohydrates. Each scoop contains 25 grams of high-quality protein, rich in BCAAs (Branched-Chain Amino Acids) crucial for muscle protein synthesis and repair. Perfect for post-workout recovery or as a convenient protein boost anytime. Mixes easily and tastes great!
products.directions: Mix 1 scoop with 6-8 oz of cold water or milk. Consume post-workout or between meals.
products.warnings: Contains milk. Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or have a medical condition.
benefits: High in BCAAs for muscle repair

products.name: Micronized Creatine Monohydrate
products.description: Pure micronized creatine monohydrate to boost strength, power, and muscle endurance during high-intensity workouts. Unflavored for versatile mixing.
products.detailed_description: Unlock your full potential with PowerPeak's Micronized Creatine Monohydrate. This highly researched and effective supplement is crucial for replenishing ATP stores, the primary energy source for muscle contractions. Micronized for superior solubility and absorption, it helps increase strength, enhance power output, and improve muscle endurance, allowing you to train harder and achieve greater gains. Ideal for athletes and bodybuilders.
products.directions: Mix 1 scoop with water or your favorite beverage. For best results, use daily, including non-training days. Loading phase optional.
products.warnings: Drink plenty of water while using this product. Not recommended for individuals with pre-existing kidney conditions. Consult a healthcare professional before use.

products.name: BCAA 2:1:1 - Blue Raspberry
products.description: Branch Chain Amino Acid (BCAA) supplement with a 2:1:1 ratio of Leucine, Isoleucine, and Valine for muscle recovery, reduced fatigue, and lean muscle preservation. Refreshing blue raspberry flavor.
products.detailed_description: Fuel your workouts and accelerate recovery with AminoCore's BCAA 2:1:1. These essential amino acids (Leucine, Isoleucine, Valine) cannot be produced by the body and must be obtained through diet or supplementation. Leucine, in particular, is critical for triggering muscle protein synthesis. Our formula helps prevent muscle breakdown during intense exercise, supports faster recovery, and reduces muscle soreness, all in a delicious blue raspberry flavor. Perfect for intra-workout or post-workout consumption.
products.directions: Mix 1 scoop with 8-10 oz of cold water and consume during or after your workout.
products.warnings: Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Consult a healthcare professional if you have any medical conditions.

products.name: Pre-Workout Ignite - Fruit Punch
products.description: High-energy pre-workout formula designed to boost focus, strength, and endurance for intense training sessions. Invigorating fruit punch flavor.
products.detailed_description: Ignite your performance with ApexFuel's Pre-Workout Ignite! This powerful blend combines scientifically backed ingredients like Beta-Alanine for endurance, Creatine for strength, L-Citrulline for pumps, and Caffeine for intense energy and focus. Get ready for explosive workouts, increased stamina, and laser-like concentration to push through your limits. Our refreshing fruit punch flavor makes it a delicious start to any training session.
products.directions: Mix 1 scoop with 6-8 oz of cold water 20-30 minutes before your workout. Assess tolerance with half a scoop.
products.warnings: Contains caffeine. Do not exceed recommended dose. Avoid taking close to bedtime. Not for individuals under 18, pregnant, nursing, or those sensitive to caffeine. Consult a physician before use.

products.name: Casein Protein - Chocolate Fudge
products.description: Slow-digesting casein protein for sustained amino acid release, ideal for overnight muscle recovery and preventing muscle breakdown. Rich chocolate fudge flavor.
products.detailed_description: Support your muscles while you sleep with NightFuel's Casein Protein. Micellar casein is a slow-digesting protein source that forms a gel in the stomach, providing a gradual and sustained release of amino acids into the bloodstream. This makes it perfect for consumption before bed to nourish muscles throughout the night, preventing catabolism and promoting continuous recovery and growth. Enjoy the delicious chocolate fudge flavor in a thick, satisfying shake.
products.directions: Mix 1 scoop with 10-12 oz of cold water or milk before bed or as a meal replacement.
products.warnings: Contains milk. Consult your physician before use if pregnant, nursing, or have a medical condition.
